availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Abigail Day on August 7, 1845. Father of Lafayette Poe, Lewis Poe, William Poe, Lucy Poe, Isaac Poe, and Milley Poe. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 174-75.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Berlin Precinct, p. 294A.
Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film # 7016168, Pendleton County, File #24448, September 18, 1940.
Ohio, County Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Film # 000327561, Clermont, August 7, 1845.
